participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Driven and focused, Alex thrives on setting and achieving personal goals. He enjoys motivational activities and sharing his passion for fitness with others.
participant_1.background: my parents were both very athletic. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons. i'm a clean eater.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and carefree, Emily values her friendships and seeks out enjoyment in life. She is determined to find independence and create her own path.
participant_2.background: i just want to have fun with my friends. i don't drink or do drugs or anything. they're constantly on my back. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. i work part-time at Burger King.
